output: As the morning sun peeks through the floor-to-ceiling windows of the sleek modern skyscraper lobby, a confidently stylish man in a tailored black suit stands out against the sea of polished office attire. His sharp jawline and intense gaze exude an air of poised authority as he adjusts his cufflinks with an air of deliberate precision. The soft, diffused light from overhead lamps casts a flattering glow on his features, accentuating the subtle curves of his eyes and lips. He shoulders his briefcase with purpose, a resolute look etched on his ruggedly handsome face, signaling the start of another productive day in the city that never sleeps.
